# AWS Rekognition Image Labeling API

This project allows users to upload a base64-encoded image to an API endpoint, which triggers AWS Lambda and analyzes the image using Amazon Rekognition.

## üîß Tech Stack
- AWS Lambda (Python)
- API Gateway (HTTP API)
- Amazon Rekognition
- IAM Roles with fine-grained permissions

## IAM Role Requirements: The Lambda function must have:
{
  "Effect": "Allow",
  "Action": [
  "rekognition:DetectLabels"
  ],
  "Resource": "*"
}

üåê API Gateway
	‚Ä¢	Route: POST /analyze
	‚Ä¢	Integration: Lambda Function
	‚Ä¢	CORS: Enabled


## üß™ Test JSON Input
```json
{
  "image": ""
}
